original_title: 魚 毛骨悚然的蠕動
overview: Something in Okinawa reeks, and it isn't long before Tadashi and his girlfriend Kaori realize that the smell is coming from dead fish, which are walking out of the sea.
tagline: Mystery, Drama, Horror, Sci-Fi, Psychological, Seinen
title: Gyo The Death-Stench Creeps
